mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, ALCOHOL, I.FILE_ORG_NAME, I.FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' AND C.PARENT_CODE = 'T'

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, ALCOHOL, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE I.FILE_STATUS = 'T'
AND P.TYPE IN
'#{item}'
AND NOT (P.TYPE = 'G' OR C.PARENT_CODE = 'W')
SELECT C1.KIND, C2.CODE_NAME, C2.CODE FROM HANJU_CODE C1 INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C2 ON C1.CODE = C2.PARENT_CODE WHERE C1.KIND = 'IMAGE_STATUS' AND NOT C2.CODE = 'G'

SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, ALCOHOL, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' AND P.TYPE = 'G'
